Hi!


I just found that there has been done some work on a mpi-radiance in the
past. This seams to be quite an interesting development but AFAIK only a very
old version of rpict has been modified to make use of mpi. Are there any new
versions of this, or is there anybody working on a "parallel-radiance"? (I ask
this after having rendered some pictures on a sun 880, an 4xultrasparc - what
still took days... ;-).


CU, Lars.
